article_title: Q&A with Elaine Bloom: ‘I took this job to help take care of people’
article_text:
Longtime lawmaker Elaine Bloom is now president and CEO of Plaza Health Network

She says wants to move on from the company’s scandal — over alleged kickbacks to doctors —after a $17 million settlement with the feds that admitted no wrongdoing

article_metadata.news-keywords: Plaza Health Network, Elaine Bloom, Miami, Florida, healthcare
article_metadata.description: Elaine Bloom was the 16th woman inducted into the Florida Legislature — and five of them had been sworn in on that same day in 1974.
article_metadata.title: Q&A with Elaine Bloom: ‘I took this job to help take care of people’ | Miami Herald
